title: idhi neeku meragaadhuraa
sahitya:
idi nIku meragAdurA shrI rAma nAmadi tallaDillEnurA



anupallavi



padilamuga golicitE bhAvamu vErE unnadi



caraNam 1



gati leni vArini gadatErcu daivamani patitapAvana nammiti shrI rAma 

     ninnati vEgamuna vEDiti santata sammatini ninnE kOriti shrI rAma



caraNam 2



parama dayALuvani pAlana sEtuvani saraguna dEvarAya gOlvina nApai 

     karuNa lEdani kannIrAye jUci nI manasu karaga dendukurA O sItArAma



caraNam 3



anniTa niNDina adbhUtAnanda ghana mannana sEya rAdA shrI rAma nI-

     kennarAni puNyamu rAdA shrI tyAgarAja sannuta nIvADanu gAdA shrI rAma!

sItArAma
